title: SmartVideo
shortDescription: Native video for your site, made effortless.
longDescription:
# **It's time for smarter online video.**

 *SmartVideo* makes the most of every video on your site without any extra work on your part. YouTube videos embedded on your site are automatically given a native, modern player. New videos can be added by simply embedding YouTube videos or adding a single HTML tag. Video playback is accelerated for faster load times and the highest possible streaming quality. Continuous streaming optimization monitors individual users' streams avoiding stall-inducing network congestion. **_SmartVideo_ makes creating a native video experience for your site _effortless_.**

---
#### What you get with SmartVideo:
   
#####  *Modern, professional-grade player*
The player included with *SmartVideo* is beautifully modern with no distractions.
   
##### *Stall-free playback*
Other video platforms rely on outdated delivery technology resulting in roughly 1 in 4 viewers experiencing a stall-out. *SmartVideo* uses Swarmify’s patent-pending delivery solution meaning no buffering in the middle of a video. Ever.
  
##### *Automagic YouTube conversions*
YouTube is great for managing your video collection but not so great for your site’s video experience. *SmartVideo* takes advantage of the easy content management provided by YouTube while adding a beautifully modern, native playback experience for your site.

##### *Continuous streaming optimization*
Throughout playback, *SmartVideo* intelligently switches between delivery networks, optimizing playback for each individual user.
   
##### *Unlimited bandwidth*
You shouldn’t be punished for serving high-quality content on your site. That’s why *SmartVideo* billing isn’t based on bandwidth, only video views.
  
##### *Maximum bitrate throughput*
Users don’t like low bitrates. *SmartVideo*’s video acceleration technology allows users to receive the maximum bitrate their personal internet connections will allow.

##### *Device-agnostic experience*
With *SmartVideo*, your content is ready to be viewed on any device in any country, in any browser.

##### *Smarter video tags*
Placing a video on your site with *SmartVideo* is as simple as inserting a single HTML tag.

##### *Ongoing support*
With the full backing of a team of developers _(super smart ones, by the way)_, you’ll never have to worry about downtime again. Just shoot us a quick email and we’ll work tirelessly to remedy any issue you’re experiencing.

##### *100% satisfaction guarantee*
This _might_ be *SmartVideo*’s best feature… if you aren’t completely satisfied with your experience after 30 days, we’ll happily refund your first month. You’ve got nothing to lose!
instructions: For further information and more options, please see our Swarmify documentation.
author: Swarmify, Inc.

proposedApp.title: Swarmify
proposedApp.shortDescription: Fail-proof video acceleration. No buffering, No excuses.
proposedApp.longDescription:
Stall-outs, blocky and pixelated playback. These are just a few of the major annoyances users experience while watching video online.

**_SmartVideo_ is video the way it always should have been.**

   * Accelerated playback – videos start faster
   * Failproof – no stall-outs during playback
   * High quality HD streaming – no blocky or pixelated streaming
   * Native look and feel - automatic YouTube embed conversions on your site *(YouTube is great, but looks unprofessional on your site)*
   * No annoying overlays - eliminate recommended videos on embedded YouTube videos that can pull visitors away

*SmartVideo* makes the most of every video on your site without any extra work on your part. Videos are automatically given a native, minimalistic player. Video playback is accelerated for faster load times and the highest possible streaming quality. Real-time network intelligence reroutes individual users’ streams to avoid stall-out-inducing network congestion. Pre-roll ads are easily integrated into your videos so you can start earning revenue through each view.

**Optimize and accelerate your video now with _Swarmify SmartVideo_.**
proposedApp.author: Swarmify, Inc.

proposedApp.title: SmartVideo
proposedApp.shortDescription: Native video for your site made effortless.
proposedApp.longDescription:
# **It's time for smarter online video.**

 *SmartVideo* makes the most of every video on your site without any extra work on your part. YouTube videos embedded on your site are automatically given a native, modern player. New videos can be added by simply embedding YouTube videos or adding a single HTML tag. Video playback is accelerated for faster load times and the highest possible streaming quality. Continuous streaming optimization monitors individual users' streams avoiding stall-inducing network congestion. **_SmartVideo_ makes creating a native video experience for your site _effortless_.**

---
#### What you get with SmartVideo:
   
#####  *Modern, professional-grade player*
The player included with *SmartVideo* is beautifully modern with no distractions.
   
##### *Stall-free playback*
Other video platforms rely on outdated delivery technology resulting in roughly 1 in 4 viewers experiencing a stall-out. *SmartVideo* uses Swarmify’s patent-pending delivery solution meaning no buffering in the middle of a video. Ever.
  
##### *Automagic YouTube conversions*
YouTube is great for managing your video collection but not so great for your site’s video experience. *SmartVideo* takes advantage of the easy content management provided by YouTube while adding a beautifully modern, native playback experience for your site.

##### *Continuous streaming optimization*
Throughout playback, *SmartVideo* intelligently switches between delivery networks, optimizing playback for each individual user.
   
##### *Unlimited bandwidth*
You shouldn’t be punished for serving high-quality content on your site. That’s why *SmartVideo* billing isn’t based on bandwidth, only video views.
  
##### *Maximum bitrate throughput*
Users don’t like low bitrates. *SmartVideo*’s video acceleration technology allows users to receive the maximum bitrate their personal internet connections will allow.

##### *Device-agnostic experience*
With *SmartVideo*, your content is ready to be viewed on any device in any country, in any browser.

##### *Smarter video tags*
Placing a video on your site with *SmartVideo* is as simple as inserting a single HTML tag.

##### *Ongoing support*
With the full backing of a team of developers _(super smart ones, by the way)_, you’ll never have to worry about downtime again. Just shoot us a quick email and we’ll work tirelessly to remedy any issue you’re experiencing.

##### *100% satisfaction guarantee*
This _might_ be *SmartVideo*’s best feature… if you aren’t completely satisfied with your experience after 30 days, we’ll happily refund your first month. You’ve got nothing to lose!

Other video platforms rely on outdated delivery technology resulting in roughly 1 in 4 viewers experiencing a stall-out. *SmartVideo* uses Swarmify’s patent-pending delivery solution meaning no buffering in the middle of a video. Ever.
  
##### *Automagic YouTube conversions*
YouTube is great for managing your video collection but not so great for your site’s video experience. *SmartVideo* takes advantage of the easy content management provided by YouTube while adding a beautifully modern, native playback experience for your site.

##### *Continuous streaming optimization*
Throughout playback, *SmartVideo* intelligently switches between delivery networks, optimizing playback for each individual user.
   
##### *Unlimited bandwidth*
You shouldn’t be punished for serving high-quality content on your site. That’s why *SmartVideo* billing isn’t based on bandwidth, only video views.
  
##### *Maximum bitrate throughput*
Users don’t like low bitrates. *SmartVideo*’s video acceleration technology allows users to receive the maximum bitrate their personal internet connections will allow.

##### *Device-agnostic experience*
With *SmartVideo*, your content is ready to be viewed on any device in any country, in any browser.

##### *Smarter video tags*
Placing a video on your site with *SmartVideo* is as simple as inserting a single HTML tag.

##### *Ongoing support*
With the full backing of a team of developers _(super smart ones, by the way)_, you’ll never have to worry about downtime again. Just shoot us a quick email and we’ll work tirelessly to remedy any issue you’re experiencing.

##### *100% satisfaction guarantee*
This _might_ be *SmartVideo*’s best feature… if you aren’t completely satisfied with your experience after 30 days, we’ll happily refund your first month. You’ve got nothing to lose!
proposedApp.author: Swarmify, Inc.

proposedApp.title: SmartVideo
proposedApp.shortDescription: Native video for your site, made effortless.
proposedApp.longDescription:
# **It's time for smarter online video.**

 *SmartVideo* makes the most of every video on your site without any extra work on your part. YouTube videos embedded on your site are automatically given a native, modern player. New videos can be added by simply embedding YouTube videos or adding a single HTML tag. Video playback is accelerated for faster load times and the highest possible streaming quality. Continuous streaming optimization monitors individual users' streams avoiding stall-inducing network congestion. **_SmartVideo_ makes creating a native video experience for your site _effortless_.**

---
#### What you get with SmartVideo:
   
#####  *Modern, professional-grade player*
The player included with *SmartVideo* is beautifully modern with no distractions.
   
##### *Stall-free playback*
Other video platforms rely on outdated delivery technology resulting in roughly 1 in 4 viewers experiencing a stall-out. *SmartVideo* uses Swarmify’s patent-pending delivery solution meaning no buffering in the middle of a video. Ever.
  
##### *Automagic YouTube conversions*

##### *Continuous streaming optimization*
Throughout playback, *SmartVideo* intelligently switches between delivery networks, optimizing playback for each individual user.
   
##### *Unlimited bandwidth*
You shouldn’t be punished for serving high-quality content on your site. That’s why *SmartVideo* billing isn’t based on bandwidth, only video views.
  
##### *Maximum bitrate throughput*
Users don’t like low bitrates. *SmartVideo*’s video acceleration technology allows users to receive the maximum bitrate their personal internet connections will allow.

##### *Device-agnostic experience*
With *SmartVideo*, your content is ready to be viewed on any device in any country, in any browser.

##### *Smarter video tags*

##### *Ongoing support*
With the full backing of a team of developers _(super smart ones, by the way)_, you’ll never have to worry about downtime again. Just shoot us a quick email and we’ll work tirelessly to remedy any issue you’re experiencing.

##### *100% satisfaction guarantee*
